allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Seven Habits List application

FastAPI web app for task management based on "7 Habits of Highly Effective People".

Features:
- Roles: Create/edit/delete life roles \(deletion blocked if tasks linked\)
- Tasks: Create/edit/complete/delete tasks linked to roles
- Schedule: View upcoming tasks by day with 60-line print limit
- Effort levels: Low/Medium/High per task
- Date scheduling within 4 weeks

Tech stack: FastAPI, Jinja2, SQLite, Uvicorn

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
